data.title: Cast Biographies: DANA SPARKS
data.meta_description: The ePassions Insider. A well-designed Passions website that is dedicated to the finest soap opera of them all... Passions! Photo galleries, cast biographies, the Citizens of Harmony, and even Sheridan's diary, this place will really keep you occupied! Read through Jessica's Journal or Sheridan's Diary. Are you addicted? Find out in our feature -are u addicted- ! See large proofs of TV Guide's special Passions covers! Come in and experience the passion for yourself...
data.text:
Grace Bennett

Dana Sparks plays "Grace Bennett," the beautiful, amnesiac wife of police chief Sam Bennett (James Hyde). She also appears as Grace's twin sister Faith Standish. Grace's best friend is Eve Russell (Tracey Ross), who is a respected doctor in Harmony. Ivy Winthrop (Kim Johnston Ulrich) is currently plotting to steal Sam away from her, using David Hastings (Justin Carroll). She is blackmailing David to pose as her pre-amnesia husband, and to lie to his son, John (Jack Krizmanich). Grace owns the local Bed & Breakfast, as well as a shop called "Grace's Treasures." Grace is mother to Noah, Kay (Deanna Wright), and Jessica (Jade Harlow). She is also a mother figure for her neice Charity Standish (Molly Stanton).

Sparks was born in the San Francisco suburb of Orinda, California. After enrolling in modeling school, she successfully auditioned for a national Coca-Cola commercial. Bitten with the acting bug Sparks' first acting audition resulted in a contract role on the series "Cover Up." Soon after, her neighbor, producer/director Blake Edwards, spied her on the beach in Malibu and cast her in the feature film "That's Life." On her second series audition, Sparks won the role of Vicki Gioberti on "Falcon Crest," where she spent two-and-one-half years. Her other television credits include "Melrose Place," "Star Trek: The Next Generation," "Murder She Wrote," "Thirtysomething," and NBC's "L.A. Law." She was most recently seen as Lieutenant Commander Carolyn Imes on the hit series "JAG."

Sparks resides in Ventura County with her husband and their dogs. An avid golfer, she enjoys playing in charity golf tournaments. Her birthday is August 1.
